title: Library in a shopping mall
text: This is a very large free library located in the center of Coex shopping mall.  Many people sit at the tables, reading, studying or viewing one of the speakers giving a presentation.

title: Fantastic Library
text: I purposely looked for Starfield Library in COEX Mall as I really wanted to see the place in person. Fantastic! That's the right word for me - tall shelves with sooo many books to browse. The library also has tables, chairs and lamps that encourages you to read and relax. Coffee shops at certain ends of the 2nd floor made it more inviting and relaxing. I can spend the whole day here!

title: Books place
text: It's a good place for reading but I have very limited time visiting there.I think i will be going again.

title: Book Heaven (If You Read Korean)
text: It's a big library with a great atmosphere, although I don't think this place would be great for studying or even reading as it can be a bit too noisy for some. All the books are in Korean (duh...) and I found it hard to look for a single English book. But they have a great collection, I supposed...and very Instagrammable too!

title: v. good place to visit
text: see and feel new experience of  library in Seoul , v. easy to reach there and not only book you can read but also provide shopping mall close to this place / good to visit it

title: Very Impressive Library in the Heart of a Mall.
text: The Starfield Library, which is pretty and impressive and beautiful. Two floors library with lots of colors and places to eat. Basically the only highlight of the Starfield COEX Mall which is pretty average.Still at the bottom of the library you will find adults posing with big teddy bears, etc, etc common of the infantile immaturity of South Koreans.But the beauty value of the library is there to be seen and for all to appreciate. Except for the Starfield Library which you can access directly from the streets, the rest of the mall is a waste of pure time.

title: Beautiful library
text: It's worth a visit to see the high stacks of books. Beautiful design and you can wander COEX mall after.

title: instagrammable library
text: It s a beautiful library. After shopping you can unwind here.  Before shopping, you can start taking pictures here.

title: Impressive library, aesthetically pleasing!
text: We took the subway to Samseong station (Line 2) to check out the COEX mall.  The mall is huge, with an aquarium, so it took us a while to find the Starfield Library.  It is located opposite the Kakao Friends' store, and when you walk in, it was impressive.  Not sure how librarians or users access the books on the top shelves though?

title: Very interesting and free
text: The former food court has become a public library. It's a good place to take a look, read a book or relax.Many locals and foreign visitors. And it wasn't that crowded.There are free e-books, too.

title: Different and beautiful
text: I love that the library is in a huge mall and that it‚Äôs full of people taking pictures and enjoying it.  I‚Äôm a huge library fan.  I like quiet stacks too, but this is different and beautiful.

title: Beautiful Library
text: It's not exactly your typical library.  In fact, this library is in the middle of the COEX Mall.  There is a small cafe in the library, and spots to sit and rest, study, read, or work on something.  However, it is not quiet.  It is a tourist spot, and people are continually moving in and out.  As a librarian myself, I thought it was a beautiful place, but as a patron, I would be annoyed with the crowds and the noise.

title: Library Popular with Photographers
text: The Starfield Library is very photogenic with its 2 story bookshelf so it attracts a lot of photographers.  We took the Subway (green line) to Samseong Station.  Look for the exit for COEX and you will find the library.  The library is inside a big mall with lots of other shops and restaurants.  You will see people riding the escalator multiple times to get a good picture.  So if you want a photo with no one, you will have to wait awhile.

title: Fantabulous Library ‚ò∫Ô∏è‚ò∫Ô∏è‚ò∫Ô∏è
text: A wonderful place for reading and catching up some knowledge that feeds the mind. A place to have some quiet time to spend and reflect and resetting goals for 2020. An amazing huge library full of thousands of books with amazing people around having the same thoughts and mind to increase their knowledge that feeds and blossom the mind. A wonderful ambience and environment to be in; there are plenty of cafes nearby this library ‚ò∫Ô∏è‚ò∫Ô∏è‚ò∫Ô∏è

title: Wonderful space to visit for a few hours
text: This place has got to be one of the most lovely and unexpected spaces to find in a shopping mall. Located in the huge mall on the main Gangnam boulevards, this Staffield Library is the focal point of one section of the mall, towering nearly 3 storey. The cafe located amongst all the volume of beautiful book shelves on their upper floor (on top of the escalators) serves excellent cakes, coffee and has an outdoor space to catch some sun on cool winter days.

title: Tall Bookshelves for Phototaking
text: It is really nice to see tall bookshelves in the middle of the mall, and mainly it is for phototaking. Books there are mainly in Korean, which i could not understand. Nothing much other than taking pictures, repeating it again. As it is situated in the mall, there are quite plenty of shops around. But to me, it's nothing much unless you are amazed and want to take a selfie by the tall bookshelf.

title: Impressed
text: I have never been in a library with so many books üòÅ You can find books in English too. The place is huge

title: Who‚Äôd a known?!
text: The COEX mall where this is found isn‚Äôt that interesting. But the signage that directs you to the Starfield Library keeps you on track to a pretty cool and unique landmark.

title: amazing
text: if you are a lover of books, reading and reading spaces you have to visit Starfield Library. I don't know of any other space quite like it.

title: OOTD Place
text: Located inside COEX Mall. Beautiful library for OOTD. tried to find en English book but it was none - but love it anyway.

title: Library in a bustling shopping mall!
text: What a great idea to place a library in a bustling shopping mall. A must visit place if you are fancy taking extraordinary picture for your Instagram.

title: Staggering Display of books
text: Admittedly, I got teary eyed when I saw all of those books with readers of all ages sitting everywhere. This public library reminded me that some parts of the world values reading BOOKS & MAGAZINES, not just texts or social media. Do visit if you're in the area & then head to the Lotte World Tower, 5th tallest building in the world.

title: Nice and Big Library
text: We were just be there to take photo as all the books are majority korean language.Opposite the mall is Beomosa, there is walking distance but nearby.

title: Over-rated
text: It's too crowded with tourists who are just taking photos there. Pity those people who really needed a place to do their work

title: Smaller than I expected - blame IG
text: I was expecting to be awe-struck But it was a "library"/ bookstore inside COEX mallStill, worth a pic for instagram . Beware: lots of other people there for the same reason.

title: Looks like something out of Harry Potter!
text: This was so not what I was expecting to find in the middle of a shopping mall - an enormous beautifully laid out library full of people of all ages browsing a reading rather than being on their phones. Amazing!

title: A little noisy.
text: It was too crowded with people taking pictures, and noisy. It's an open area library with cafes around. The ambience wasn't my cup of tea and I was only here to take pictures.

title: Loved this
text: I‚Äôm not sure this would be worth making a special trip to visit, but we were already in the area to visit Bonguensa temple (just over the road from the COEX Mall) so came in to see the library. It is wonderful - as book lovers it was a real jaw dropping sight! I can‚Äôt really imagine a UK shopping mall having a public library as a centrepiece...

title: Every mall should have one!
text: Wonderful resource in the middle of the mall.  For non-Korean readers, the offerings are a bit limited as most of the books are in Korean.  Nevertheless, there is a great selection of English magazines.  Very enjoyable to sit, people watch and take photos (which is what most were doing).  Having said all that, it is a great idea and other malls would do well to follow suit, even with a small/modest collection, if only to encourage people to read.

title: More akin to Barnes & Noble
text: So this was so neat to see, it's a beautfiul library, however, it's just too crowded with people grabbing the most insta-worthy picture. I felt a bit like Belle must have in Beauty and the Beast when she saw all those books in the massive library, but I was pretty sure I couldn't read any. We left after only 10 minutes here because it was just too crowded and noisy.

title: Really entertaining for people watching
text: I wouldn't quite call this a must-see attraction. As a library - it's pretty, but it's not particularly large. Also all the books are in Korean (no surprise).What makes it more appealing is how comfortable the surroundings are (you can grab a comfortable chair, and there's a good bakery on the second level for coffee and dessert) and just how entertaining it can be if you need a bit of a rest and want to do some people watching. Interesting to watch all the people go through taking photos, selfies, staging full on photo shoots fully dressed up and posing as they ride up and down the escalator.

title: Picturesque Library
text: This is a unique library in the middle of a mall and convention center. Not sure how functional it is, but it makes a unique spot in the mall.

title: Bright open and airy space (except for the noise!)
text: Situated in an upmarket shopping Mall (Coex), it seems an odd place to place a public library. It's definitely noisy and not the greatest place for a library. The upper levels are definitely better for reading and all the seats and desks are occupied most of the time. However, if you're into a look rather than a feel, it's definitely worthwhile walking through amongst the sea of books and look for the best place to take some photos. The books displayed on the upper open shelves are just boxes with a title page stuck on them. Practically speaking there would have been no easy way to access them so they are there purely for show. If you're near or in Coex (eg going to SM Tower), it's worth coming past.

title: Typical KOrean site- Instagrammable and totally pointless
text: It's not like the books on those gorgeous shelves are accessible. You can't really read b/c of the noise even if you could snag one of the few chairs. They spent a lot of $ on construction - b/c Insta publicity is more valuable than anything else.

title: If in the area walk in
text: This place is impressive. I would not invest time to go there, but if by coincidence you are in the area (e.g. because of your hotel), walk in and sit down for some minutes on the upper level seats.

title: Best photoshoot, library theme
text: This library is bright, looks fabulous and offers the best place to take photos with books.The location is very convenient for leisure and shopping.We did not browse the book lists though.

title: Modern Library
text: It is a library where you can take a very instagrammable pictures. Stunning design of the skyhigh book racks. If you really want to read a book, i would say that the environment is quite noisy as it is accessible to COEX shopping mall with many people walking around. A korea entertainment industry is also there and if you are a K-pop fans, you‚Äôll gone crazy looking at your idol‚Äôs posters.

title: Upscale mall
text: It is inside the Starfield Mall which is an upscale one, easily accessible on Line 2.  If you are going to Gangnam anyway, it is worth going.  You will like to take some photo of the place and do some shopping in the mall, which is one of the best in the city.  There are a lot of choice of restaurant.  If you have the time, you may also visit the aquarium which is quite nice.

title: Inspirational - a beacon in a sea of shops
text: Who would have thought to place a library in the middle of a shopping mall, near Samseong Metro Station? It was genius who brought this to life with such an inspired design.Starfield Library has four stacks - eight layers of books mostly for display - one at each corner of a square. There are books and magazines accessible to the public, at shelf level. There are chairs and desks to sit at to read them, which were all well used. It's a busy buzzing place.Take it in slowly, and explore the Library from all angles, and on both levels, to absorb the genius. Take a spare chair. Listen to the tinkling piano music.Then indulge another sense - taste - and go to the Billy Angel Cake shop on the upper level in one of the stacks and enjoy their famous carrot cake and a long tea.  Then go back into the mall inspired by an architectural marvel.

title: Short View Of Library
text: Went all the way to this place..saw the library inside a mall but never did get a chance at all to look at the shops inside the mall. Wasted day spent with a person who would rather shop at markets instead..

title: Harry Potter in Korean is here :)
text: Gangnam can be a bit of a trek by metro is you are staying in Jongno or near Namsan but if you want to visit a cool mall, Coex is fun.  The library is a great Instagram spot and you can have the fun of checking out Harry Potter books in Korean and the Star Wars novels in Korean as well.

title: Underwhelming
text: Pretty cool stack of books in the middle of a busy/popular mall.  Not sure that it qualifies as a library and I cannot imagine that there is any hope of getting work/studying done here.  Hugely popular spot for taking pictures - lots of individuals/couples/families taking pictures all over the place to the point where it is 1. impossible to get a picture without getting someone else posed in yours 2. impossible to avoid getting into someone else's picture.  If you are at the Coex mall for another reason it is worth visiting - not worth the trip just to see the "library".

title: Amazing design
text: This is such a great place to relax while you wait at the mall.  It's filled with books and magazines you can read for free and they have desks like a library where some locals study or read. The shops around are also international brands.

title: Good not Enough
text: I love the interior design,Everyone appreciates around there, But staff is not friendly / there is someone who wears glasses with White shirt/ Guy which is i asked about take a photo of me he said just NO, and staring at me like noONe. Bad experienced for solo traveller

title: A very cool library
text: I went to this library the first day I came to Seoul. It is really big and really nice. I could have spent hours there just watching all the books.There is also a cafe. Some people also try to study there but I wasn't sure if they really succeed. For me, it's a little bit too loud for studying but the sit there, read a book, drink a coffee or tea, it's fantastic.

title: Awesome Library
text: I was so amazed by how big this library is! This was so strategically located, so it can easily be accessed by locals and tourists alike.

title: Noisy library but fantastic vibes
text: Given it‚Äôs proximity to the Co-Ex museum, this was meant to be a pit stop for me to tick off my Seoul list.  However we stayed for a longer than expected time, taking in the tall structures (3 in all) and how they have been categorised.There‚Äôs a whole lot of movement and noise (not your conventional library) and obviously Korean books make up 95% of all the books here.  Interesting to see that there are donated books -both by large corporates/ Foundations and by individuals.There is a very short write up to the library in Korean with a smithing (subtitled mainly) of English -which i had fed back to the information counter, was insufficient.Spoiler alert: middle to TOP layers are ‚Äúfake books‚Äù according to the lady at the counter... don‚Äôt quote me coz it could be lost in translation; but frankly, it didn‚Äôt make much difference if that was the truth ;)

title: Huge and beautiful library
text: The library is probably more for photo taking then books reading. Undoubtedly very instagramable. While it isn‚Äôt totally silent yet it is not noisy. Problem is that it is very crowded. Still glad that I came.

title: Very big library
text: This library is huge with an amazing interior and place to enjoy your time. There are quite a lot selection of books that you can choose. However, almost all of the books that provided in here were in Korean. But it's a good place to take pictures also

title: massively beautiful
text: Lovely place and a must visit while in Seoul. This library is at the Coex Mall, so there is a lovely Mall adjacent to this. Lots of restaurants and cafes, even McDonald's. Lots of photo opportunities. there is a duty free area downstairs as well, so you can purchase alcohol, cigarettes etc duty free, just remember your passport.

title: Impressive
text: I heard about this place but definitely have to visit the place in person to realize the crazy nature of the design and the architecture. Highly recommend.

title: Kids can read for free
text: If your staying around the area in the hotels this is a good place to meet up if you lose each other. I came her with my family with 4 kids. Ranging from 9years to 7 months. We rested on couches and read some books to the kids so they could take a break from the heat.

title: Instagrammable
text: I don't think it's worth traveling to, but it was a cool experience for the first 10 minutes. Maybe if you're bored with your friends and are in the area, but as it's a bit out of the way, I think if your time is limited in Seoul/Korea, then your time could be used for something else. This is something that I would recommend more for someone who was living in Seoul and was looking for something else to experience than someone who's traveling to Seoul/South Korea and has limited time here.

title: Wow
text: One of the highlights of this trip.  How good is a library in a mall?   People were using it from early morning to late at night.  It is just a wonderful resource and piece of design.  I just kept coming back to enjoy

title: Busy nice library
text: This is a library in the middle of the Coex mall. Most tourists are busy taking photos. Huge library and beautiful in this building. Turn left when you get out of the station facing SM town

title: Beautiful!
text: I haven't been to a library with this unique layout. Massive number of books and areas to study and read. It was relatively quiet compared to the amount of people who were passing through. Great place for a book lover!

title: A beautiful library!
text: This library is very inviting as a place to sit and read for hours, or take photos.  Not sure if there are any English books, but there were all kinds of Korean books.  It's worth visiting if you want an Instagrammable travel photo.

title: Impressive
text: Just like pics. Really an impressive place, especially by night with all the lights. Even without stopping to take a book, the library itself make you feel small. A funny thing is that when you go upstairs, there are coffee shops and small stores between the shelves.The COEX Mall in its whole is really a cool place to go shopping!

title: Just like in pics
text: If you are around, definitelly nice to see, but for tourist there is not much more than what you see in pictures.

title: Starfield Library in COEX ‚Äì Paradise for BOOK LOVERS
text: If you are in Seoul City (South Korea) you must visit Gangnam District. If you visit Gangnam then you must visit COEX. In COEX there are lots of Shopping Malls, Restaurants, Coffee shops, Hotels, Playing area.. you name it. Everything is there. But there is one place you should not skip while you are in COEX. ‚ÄúTHE STARFIELD LIBRARY‚Äù Its free of entry. I visited and I was amazed with the library. The library is gigantic, unique and believe me lots and lots of books.  (Check my pictures ‚Äì you can feel it)It‚Äôs a paradise for book lovers! I would say its worth to visit and you will love it.

title: Quite unique for a shopping mall
text: We were walking through Coex and Starfield when we passed by this library. It looks stunning, towers of books and books, in the middle of the mall. It is like an oasis in the hustle and bustle of Coex. People grab books , sit down and read, just like in a library.Quite stunning overall.

title: Interesting
text: How books became an element of decor ? Well, that place is probably showing the way. If you are looking for literature, pass your way. But if you want to see people reading "for the dummies" while shopping, you won't be disapointed.

title: A Star In The Centre Of Starfield
text: A stunning example of design in this sprawling underground shopping mall. Take time to enjoy the ceiling as well. Such a great place to watch people taking selfies, especially while going up and down the escalators!  Back in the days when I used to buy many books I would have gone sick in this bookshop!

title: Gigantic and photogenic library
text: The library is located in department store so it's easy to find. It's really beautiful place and cool to visit. It's a instagram hot spot that you shouldn't miss.

title: Beautiful crossroads between mall streets
text: Books, books everywhere! A nice place to visit especially if you are thinking of shopping in the malls as well. You can also just pop in to see it and enjoy a coffee or snack at one of the cafes or shops located inside the giant cornerstone bookshelves, accessed via escalators to the second floor.

title: Amazing
text: Love this library. Its  fancy... but  simply artistic. Ive taken multiple selfies during my visit. I passed this site  multple times as  this is  near  the venue  of  our convention.

title: Books Stonehenge
text: Smack in the middle of COEX mall, with no doors and all open access, you will find this monument to printed books. Natural light filters in from the ceiling and the sides of the mall (the largest below-ground mall in Asia), illuminating the gigantic bookshelves with carefully-placed books, giving a first impression of wonderment and spaciousness. Part library and part tourist attraction, it is likely that the tourists taking pictures outnumber the actual library patrons, though the patrons linger with a book in one of the many seats arranged in the hall, and the tourists snap pictures and move on. A cafe is conveniently located in the premises, for those who want something sweet with their reading. The concept is very interesting, as it appears like a space for boundless access to information. But in this day and age, when printed books are quickly being replaced by electronic media, this library is a work of art that could be interpreted in many ways by the diverse audience...

title: A Must See in COEX Mall !
text: Speaking personally, I think that the idea of having a library in the middle of a bustling mall is utterly genius. Starfield library is a perfect place to gather and have a read-fest, or to have your shopping break.

title: Library with giant bookshelves!
text: A library with giant bookshelves, what do you expect? Certainly an iconic place and must be visited! You can relax while reading a book here, of course you can also take dozens of photos. Its location inside a shopping place makes it quite comfortable.

title: Booklover's Paradise
text: Booklover's unite! Located in the center of Coex Mall is this dreamy and welcoming place called the Starfield Library. Note that since it is inside a mall, there is a constant hum of noise and activity so it is not like the typical library you may familiar with but it is worth a visit nonetheless. Rounded and lighted bookshelves stretch far above your head and are simply mesmerizing to see. You can sit on the steps below the bookshelves or at any of the various tables located throughout. Pictures do not do this gem justice.

title: Incredible!
text: Let me know if you find out how they get to those books right at the top!! All in Korean, of course, but spectacular and it's part of the mall.

title: keep the expectations low
text: this was the main reason to why i went over to coex starfield mall. and boy was i disappointed. i was expecting like multi-leveled library but it was just a two floor library. don't get me wrong, it is quite the sight but i was expecting too much. it is good to see see, but that's about it. every around is using the spaces like a library

title: Calm in the sea of shops
text: This place is really a god send in the large COEX mall and really you can not believe you stepped into a library. Public space meets a library, where people indeed linger and enjoy themselves. One element to make a simple mall stand out.

title: Starfield Library at COEX Mall
text: Being tourists in Seoul, we went to the Starfield COEX Mall primarily to to see and take photos of the huge Starfield Library. And, indeed it was huge, and photo-worthy. 5 stars.

title: Holiday
text: I thought books in original printed form would become extinct. Not here. The place is amazing and definitely worth a visit. Seeing people sitting and reading was an unbelievable experience.

title: Stunning design
text: Excellent for photo-taking! Most of the books were in Korean so we could not understand it at all. Nonetheless, the library itself was beautiful and we ended up taking many pictures there.

title: Book Lovers Paradise
text: We stumbled upon this library inside the Starfield Coex Mall and we were quite surprised  with its eyecatching design and thousands of available books that rose all the way to the glass ceiling.  That ceiling also greatly added to the ambiance and let in lots of natural light during the day. Both Korean and foreign books were displayed here covering many different subjects and all could be retrieved for your reading pleasure.During our visit, it seemed more tourists than book readers were present.  However there were a lot of different places to read and enjoy your book or sit back and people watch.

title: unique library style
text: the only reason i visit this gangnam area is because of this library.worth to have a look at this place.

title: Unique Library
text: When you should visit Starfield Shopping Mall at Coex you should visit this unique library.Free of entry , the setting is really extraordinary.

title: What's more photogenic than this?
text: The shopping mall is not close to the downtown area. It took almost 45 minutes to reach there by metro. The shopping mall is nice, with all sorts of shops one would die for in Hongdae (but a lot less crowded). The Starfield Library is as photogenic as it is shown in the photos available online, but most books are in Korean.

title: Interesting photogenic place
text: The high rise bookshelves are very popular among instagrammers. The design of the bookstore with the high rise shelves is indeed interesting. Enough space to walk around, many chairs to sit and read books, a good place to relax in between shopping in the biggest underground mall in south east asia or maybe in the world.

title: Nothing much to see
text: Nothing much to see. Has a cafeteria selling cakes/cookies and a convenience store.Not suggested for foreigners.

title: My #imightSEOULyou trip
text: Starfield is a nice mall to shop if your into big budget shopping. It has all the luxurious items you can name.

title: The Biggest Library I‚Äôve Ever Seen
text: A very popular attraction in Seoul, this is a giant library in the middle of a mall - Coex Mall. It is an open public area where any one can go in freely, sit down have a break and relax, immerse themselves in books and other related materials. In the middle of the library is a tall art installation made of books? You don‚Äôt have to worry because there are lots of seating areas either on the ground or 2nd floor. There are even long tables on the ground floor and small cozy tables on corners in the 2nd floor where you can have a quiet moment to yourself. But with the thousands of books available you may think it will be difficult to find the book that you prefer. But each section is properly named as to the genre of the book. Don‚Äôt miss this out!

title: Breathtaking library
text: Stumbled across this place when I visited SMTown Museum. It's really great for photo-taking opportunity

title: Symbolic library
text: First, this is a very great spot to post in FB or IG, pretending to be a bookworm.I did a quick look, the books here are mostly in Korean.But you can get your stuff to read and work here too.But it can be very hot during noon, since the light can get through the glass roof.There are also a cute cafe and convenient store in case you are hungry.

title: beautiful library
text: simple and yet unique design must pay a visit to have a close up look into the concept and overall view

title: A sight to behold!
text: We stopped by this library for only a few minutes to see it, but it was very impressive! Everything feels so open & it is very bright. There was abundant seating available for anyone who wanted to sit and read, or even just relax. Being in the mall, it wasn't as quiet as most libraries but it was very warm and inviting.

title: Big Library
text: Starfield library located inside Coex Mall. This mall is really big. Well, I can't say I enjoy my time here but still good to visit.

title: You Have to Check This Out
text: From a Western perspective, the Starfield Library is both wacky and cool. Located in the model of the COEX mall, this is a walk-through, multi-level library with thousands of books. And two walls of books used to create mosaics.

title: Impressive Library
text: Came across this impressive library in Gangnam. Its stack of books is from floor to ceiling. However, I noticed that people inside are either just sitting down and resting (like me) if not snoozing or are there on their cellphones but not really reading books.

title: Cool library!
text: It‚Äôs super chilled to take a rest here and even read a book. Or just sit down and listen to the calm music which is playing there. Really calm and chilled place. Easy to find in the Starfield mall. You can take the metro to Samseung (World Trade center).

title: Worth of Visit
text: Un-expected such a stunning huge library with artistic deco. Whoever in Seoul, should visit the library and spends some time of exposure the area and books. Worth of visit to this place.

title: Really Amazing
text: We walked into Starfield COEX Mall and came across the usual shops, boutiques restaurants.....all very nice and attractive, and then we saw this truly amazing place. This huge library at least seven or eight levels high, stacked with books...books...and more books!! These days when bookshops are disappearing fast, this is really the place for book lovers. One can easily spend the whole day ‚Äì there are places for sitting and reading as long as one wants. Wish there were more books in English ‚Äì for tourists and visitors from abroad. It really hits you the first time you enter ‚Äì definitely worth a visit.

title: WOW, that's a first!
text: Headed out to Lotte world and walked through the library without expecting it and we were all blown away. It's one of the most beautiful library that I've set my own upon. It's not your average library because of it's art deco look, if B & N could have a book store like this in the U.S they would have a harder time getting people to leave. You can literally spend quite some time being there and enjoying the view and what it has to offer in it's selection.

title: Insta-worthy library!
text: Students would surely love to go to libraries if there are places like this in every country. It's so stunning! It's not just perfect for studying and having some "me-time", but also a perfect place for an instagrammable photo.

title: Feels Like in Hogwarts
text: Visiting this library reminds you to Hogwarts, the magic school in Harry Potter. If you are a Potterhead, you will this Hogwarts feeling when you see a giant bookshelf in the Starfield Library. The library only has korean in the book searching system, so if you want to find any specific book, you have to understand hangeul.The books is not only in korean but also available in English.You can choose many comfortable place to sit and read book. There's also a cafe inside the library.Statrfield library located in Coex Mall and while you there, you can also visit SMTown since it's in the same complex location. It's very easy to reach by public transportation, even bus or subway.

title: Piece of Artwork
text: this is a piece of artwork. This entails a lot of details. The artistry I imagine of the person who designed this is extraordinary.

title: Humongous!!
text: I've  never been in a library that is soo huge. We didn't get a chance to read nor look for books, but this is a place you don't want to miss if you will go to Starfield mall.

title: Very instagrammable
text: Amazing! You wont feel like you in a library. Located on COEX Mall and connecting to the shopping mall. Go on weekdays as there will be less people around

title: Can`t describe in words
text: The library is amazing!! Super clean, clear and everything a library shoud be. There are also foreigner books and magazines. I loved!

title: Lovely spot
text: This beautifully decorated library was surprisingly not out of place in the middle of COEX mall. We loved all of the art!

title: Beautiful and unique library
text: Go during weekdays. There will be less people around and it‚Äôs easier for you to get a decent photos.

title: Library.
text: Unbelievable to see thousands of books kept in this "open" library with awesome coffee shops in between.

title: Amazing
text: This is an impressive library for the local. All the books are in korean but worth visiting. Have a cup of coffee and enjoy the decor and take lots of pictures.

title: Really cool structure
text: Great place to sit down and relax. Also a famous place for photo opportunity. Located inside Coex Mall.

title: A great place to relax and people watch, Oh and read.
text: What a gem in the middle of a huge mall. Books as far as the eye can see. Plenty of seating, no lying down allowed. Books not only in Korean but other languages as well. I enjoyed sitting, reading and watching people walk by. a great place to spend an hour or so.

title: Super Cool
text: It's total madness! Woe, i'm stunned! So cool :)Good for your instagram . ahhahaha.. Well, it's a nice place to sit and read a book.

title: Interesting stop at Coex mall
text: As a tourist attraction, I can say that the library is quite stunning. However as a person who has worked at a library and has spent over a decade studying in one, I cannot see how this is a place where you can concentrate reading anything with people talking  & texting on their cell phones, tourists coming and going.

title: Happiness for Bookworm
text: This place is a heaven to bookworm like me. but as far as i see, (but please cmiiw) the books only available in korean. but you know this place is amazing..

title: spectacular
text: It is work to goo there. I am not sure many people read the books on the shelves of this spectacular structure, bec pause South Koreans are very digitised. But the structure is really interesting.

title: Stunning Open Library Concept in a Mall
text: I think it was a rather unique and stunning open library concept to sit and read a book or to chill. There are many books around and seats. Definitely worth a visit if you happen to be in the Gangnam area.

title: HUGE and AMAZING
text: Never seen so beautiful and so huge library inside the mall before. Starfield Library was really nice and amazing. There was a book signing event when we went there and it was a weekend so the library was jampacked with people. There is cafe inside the library. A good place to visit if you're in Gangnam District.

title: What a great concept!
text: If you happen to be shopping at the COEX Mall check out this unique library experience or to just experience some quiet down time.

title: Just A library
text: There are korean books, English magazines and chairs to sit in and read. There was piano music from loudspeakers. Not very good  loudspeakers and not very good piano music either. Any one can enter and read. The photos people publish make it look larger than it is. The ceiling is very high but I have seen many libraries that are larger than this. It is a good place to sit and read if you are in the coex mall and need a place to sit and reed. Not worth a detour at all, though.

title: Fascinating Design
text: It is amazing to see a library inside a busy shopping mall. It is a good place if your friends are not interested in shopping but have to wait for you, this is a place for them to read some books and magazines while waiting. Just wonder how people can have access to the books at the very top parts of the shelves.

title: great place to look around and take photo
text: while staying in Intercon. you can hang around in CoEX do lot of things. Starfield Library display seasonal statue in the middle and its great place to take a photo.

title: Amazing concept
text: A huge library in the center of a busy shopping mall, what more can one say! It was an unexpected pleasant surprise. Most of the books are in Korean but there are also some English language books and magazines. Most people are passing shoppers, but almost everyone sits down for a few minutes to soak in the unique atmosphere of this place. One can also spot serious library-goers perusing the books and magazines.  admire the place and ,

title: Impressive
text: This place is crowded but captivating. You can actually read the books on the shelves! Some people sit there for a bit while reading or doing some work, but the majority are just passing by.It's nice to see if you're in the mall, if you're lucky enough you'll be able to sit and rest for a bit.

title: christmas theme and displays inside this impressive library with wall to wall of bookcases
text: amazing library inside the CoEx mall where tourists and locals gather to read and sightsee. there are tables for visitors to read through out the library. highly recommend.

title: Great use of the mall space
text: First of all how cool was it to have a multi storey library with elegantly stacked books in the central atrium of the CoEx Mall! and the mall itself houses the pricier brands, and so if you want to just do something indoors, this place aint bad at all!

title: Awesome library like no other
text: This is unlike your typical solemn library. Given it is inside a busy mall, you can expect lots of folks walking in just to take pictures of this unique designed library.

title: Very Unusual Library - Must See
text: We did not know its existence until we accidentally walked into it at the CoEx mall.  Initially we thought it was a book shop.  Later we realised it was a library with unusual display methods.  We spent 30 mins. admiring and taking photos at the ground and upper floors.  A must see in Seoul.  Entrance is free.

title: Stafford Library Seoul
text: This simply stunning library is situated in the huge shopping mall the Coex Shopping centre situated in Gangnam ,(famous for the song Gangnam style) it's such a picturesque very well stocked library.The whole experience of the Coex is very memorable and worthwhile.

title: Worth a quick visit
text: Such an ingenious idea. This place makes great pictures. It‚Äôs easily accessible, so if your time permits swing by to take some pictures and if you love shopping this place will be your paradise. Lotte World is within the same premise.

title: Vacation
text: Came here just to take a photo of this famous Starfield library. The layout is spectacular. Very nicely done but one wonder how to reach out to these books at this height. Nevertheless this place make a good site for Instagram.

title: Decent
text: Interesting concept, but it's really just a library in the middle of a shopping mall. Can get busy at times with tourists taking pictures. There are also events happening at the library itself (e.g. launch of new book etc) so expect the place to be noisy and chaotic.

title: A world of books!
text: A great place to take photos as the books have some of the best spines and covers we‚Äôve seen. Not a place to sit and read or buy books unless you‚Äôre Korean or can read Korean. Each corner has a shop, coffee place and E Mart so you can‚Äôt go around the top floor without going through one of those places, which can be a bit embarrassing if you‚Äôre not buying anything and just passing through.

title: amazing
text: this a gigantic high end mall with many levels and a wide variety of shops. But it is the central atrium - aka library that is amazing. With books stacked so high covering the walls for - i believe purely aesthetic reasons only. How would u browse the shelves if they were 3 metres high?

title: Library and Shopping All in ONE
text: Starfield Library is impressive.   The library is so huge with thousands and thousand of books in the book shelves.  It comprises with different topics from magazine to fiction.   You can spend one day by just looking at the index.  The design is innovative and eye-catching with a huge book shelves and a big bunch of colourful vegetables in the centre of the hall.  If you are the photo-taking lover, it is a very good place to take a photo.  However, there was a incident when I was there.   There is a Korean male came to us and spoke Korean to us.  His eyes look abnormal and we were quite scare.  So watch out when you arrive there.The Library is attached with COEX Mall and it has so many shops that you can spend whole day there.   The centre of the hall has irregular event and we met a special discount event.  It is really good deal!  Glad to be there and got a nice jacket with really good price.   The Food Court has many choices of food and I have the traditional rice with beef.  It is yummy and tasty.The location is quite easy to find.  Hotel concierge has advised us to take a bus to go there.   It takes about 1 hour but the bus stop do not have English, so you have to be aware when to drop off.   When we leave the mall, we were trying to ask the enquiry desk about the return route.  The reception was not helpful and told me she is the receptionist of the mall.  She only knows the information about the mall.   This is the 2nd time I encountered this, I was so surprised that such a big mall and they will not provide the transportation information.   The 1st time I encountered this incident, I was in Busan.  So when you plan to go to Korea, you better check all your routing before you go there.

title: Stunning
text: We love to visit Libraries every time we visit different countries. This is one of the best so far, love the open concept of the Library and the setting too. You can casually walk in and feel free to sit down, they provide different types of sitting area to fit everyone needs.

title: Architecturally Stunning
text: Beautifully designed library located within the COEX Shopping Mall. Nice to walk through and/or spend some reading or quiet time, and then back to shopping if that‚Äôs your thing.

title: Not much English books, but it's about atmosphere
text: Thousands of books at the center of the shopping mall.It is amazing that nobody every steals a book from here.Enjoy the atmosphere of Koreans of all ages enjoying books.

title: Awesome & Amazing Library in Seoul
text: This Awesome & Amazing Library is located in Starfield COEX - Seoul, in Gangnam area. It's very huge and has tons of books & magazines. Most of them are in Korean. The design & decoration are very nice & beautiful. It's a new spot to drop by. It's very crowded during weekend.

title: Smaller than I thought but still stunning!
text: For some reason, I didn't know that this library was in Coex Mall so when I stumbled across it I was delighted. It's as beautiful as the pictures show and the architecture and thought put into its design is really quite spectacular.

title: Amazing!
text: It is unusual to see a library in the middle of the mall nad Starfield Library did not disappoint. They have convenience store within the library and a coffee shop too. There are tables provided should you want to study or read some materials. There are also charging slots available.

title: very unique!
text: hmm. as a first timer seeing this huge library brings joy to me.. 1 huge library inside a mall is awesome not only that you can actually read those books for free... the place is very Instagramable... never miss this place when you visit seoul... on the downside there aren't many english books here hehe

title: Majestic
text: Very beautiful design and architecture; it wasn‚Äôt too crowded on a Thursday afternoon, so great for chilling and reading. But Coex Mall - where the library is housed in - can be very confusing to navigate through.

title: Amazing library
text: We went to Seoul this summer and it was the hottest summer in 100 years, so we decided to look up indoor places to go.  And we found Starfield LIbrary!  You have to see it in person to feel the size of that place.  The place is inside the COEX mall and it's huge. The bonus is you can also shop and eat at the mall, and right next to the mall is the SM Town.  You can get there by subway, very convenient.

title: Amazing!
text: What an amazing place. I was dumbstruck to see inside this mall is a huge library with at the corner, a singer was singing on a small stage. You must make it a point to visit this place and you will be clicking away taking photos of the amazing views of the books arranged up to the ceiling.

title: Huge underground library
text: This huge library is located underground in the shopping mall of COEX convention center. Some western magazines can be freely browsed.

title: Gangnam's must-visit place
text: My boyfriend and I went there in the end of May, 2018. The library is located next to SMTown, inside of Coex Mall. You will be amazed with giant book shelves. You won't help to take a photo right away with the book shelves here. They are gorgeous.

title: Big library
text: I really like the idea of a library inside a mall. I also saw this in Hong Kong but Starfield Library inside COEX mall is massive. There are so many books and a few were in English. As a book lover, I could relax here if the shopping got too much.

title: A library worth going to for book worms
text: I'm a big bookworm, so I loved going to this place even though most of their books are in Korean I still enjoyed seeing all the books and not to mention the 13m bookshelves that displayed books and magazines.  This library also has the most magazines you can find here in Korea, and they have an up to date e-book system as well. If you love taking pictures, this would be a great place to get some of those Instagram-worthy pictures and for the sake of content too for bloggers and vloggers.

title: Wonderful
text: Most interesting library for sure. How do they reach those books anyhow? Definitely a site to see and lots more going on in and around the library.

title: Interesting library
text: Definitely worth a visit if you are staying nearby or plan to do some shopping in the mall. Very inviting atmosphere during both the day and night.

title: Impressive
text: An open space library. Very impressive. They also have an English section. Will definitely spend more time here tomorrow.

title: Must visit
text: I'm not really a book lover but this place made me want to get a good book, sit in the corner and read as much as I can. I like that there are many people actually reading, because I kinda expected most of them would just be taking pictures. There were shelves that need to be filled. And I hope they add some books in different languages so that foreign visitors can also read in there.Will I come back? Yes and I will recommend it to anyone visiting Seoul, especially for solo travelers

title: Instagram worthy place
text: This place is picture perfect and instagram worthy. Photographers and bloggers will love this place.

title: Interesting idea!
text: Interesting idea to have a library in the middle of a mall and be totally open!  While I'm not sure how functional this is as a traditional library, it sure seems to be very attractive design.  Many places to sit, chat and web browsing.  If you are serious reading, ear plugs might be handy for it is bit noisy.

title: Cozy place
text: Cozy place and fascinating to have such a beautiful library design in Korea. You‚Äôll be surprised by many people focusing in their reading regarding the dynamics environment in Coex.

title: Book Lovers Paradise
text: Set amidst a shopping mall this is a phenomenal place with   books stacked  13 mts  tall in nearly 3,000 sq mts containing 50,000 books and has no admission fee .It is  open around the year 365 days  and is quite a draw amongst locals particularly men  while then women are busy splurging they are engrossed in books  almost all Korean though .The only English language publications are several magazines one can browse through .Go and experience this place  illuminated with elevators open 10.30 a.m. to 10 p.m.

title: Cozy and Fascinating
text: Located within the COEX mall, surrounded by clothing stores and restaurants, the Starfield Library is a nice place to sit down and take a break from a long day of site seeing in the area. One can easily get a coffee at any of the many shops nearby and read a magazine and relax at this exciting library.

title: Its beautiful, but no english books
text: If u re looking for a place to buy english books don‚Äôt go there, they just have magazines, i was very disappointed...

title: Worth a visit
text: The library is really awe-inspiring. I read that there are English books but I didn't bother to look for it. A really good spot to sit and soak in the bookish atmosphere before hitting the stores in COEX mall.

title: Beautiful Library!
text: This does not disappoint!    A fantastic design.     This is worth a stop if you‚Äôre near COEX.   It is beautiful and inviting.   Fun to sit and read, relax, and have a coffee.   ^^

title: Remarkable!
text: Just two months before my visit to Seoul i heard of this new library. I'm already familiar with COEX Mall, but didn't have any idea where the library was located.In one evening i visited COEX and i found out that the new library was located in the center area. An area that was used to have seasonal events.As you can see from the pictures, the library is HUGE! Of course most are Korean books. But they do have some english books. Not that many. Everyone can read it for free. Not sure how to borrow a book. Guess you need to be a member first.As you can also see, so many shelves with books. I noticed from the elevators (yes, I explored the library) that most books are for decorations only. They are not even books. Just boxes with prints. The books from the reading shelves, are arranged quite helpful. You can see categories in both korean and english. It also have desks, tables, lights, couches, electricity, etc to make you convenient.There is a mini market where you can buy drinks, pens, etc. and also a cake/ pastryshop. Guess they provide these so young people want to visit the library. At the upstairs, i could see that not everyone was reading a book. Some were taking selfies, photographs, and some even just chatting. I wouldn't be surprised if i saw couples dating.Overall i really recommend you to visit this library. Take an hour stay and enjoy the atmosphere.

title: Worth to stop by
text: If you're visiting Coex, worth stop by to see how they utilize the space, interior design, etc.The library has 50 thousand books which you can read on site.

title: Nice open space for me-time
text: Nice alternative to the usual drinking holes - lots of international reading material, nice photo place.

title: Cool space, great for photos and relaxation
text: Awesome space in the middle of Starfield shopping complex in Seoul. It's striking to see so many books floor to ceiling. It's a great photo spot - there many people who came alone to find quality time as well as couples on dates and family with children. Lovely spot!
